name: The Life of A.J. Chegwidden Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what episode was A.J. Chegwidden first seen?
questions.explanation:
Smoked.

	Admiral AJ Chegwidden first appeared in the first season episode "Smoked".

Albert Jethro.

	A.J.'s full name wasn't revealed until the end of "War Stories" when Bud and Harriet decided to name their son, AJ.

Yes.

	A.J. married Marcella Peretti. Marcella Peretti was first seen in the fourth season episode, "Going After Francesca".

questions.text: How many children does A.J. have?
questions.explanation:
1.

	A.J. has one daughter, Francesca Peretti, who showed up in "With Intent To Die", but didn't appear in Washington until "The Stalker". Francesca was kidnapped in "Going after Francesca", and helped Harm with a case in "Clipped Wings".

questions.text: What special forces team was the Admiral a part of?
questions.explanation:
SEALs.

	A.J. was the the leader of SEAL team 3 in Vietnam. He left the SEALS for Surface Warfare after Vietnam.

questions.text: Admiral Chegwidden was arrested with Bud and Harm in "Wedding Bell Blues".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Mac came to bail out Bud and Harm after Bud's bachelor party went wrong and she found the Admiral with them.

questions.text: What animal did the Admiral have at home?
questions.explanation:
Dog.

	In the 2003 episode, "Heart and Soul", while out flying with Harm, the Admiral ejected himself into the GW forest and a dog helped him find his way to a diner where Harm found him. When Meredith met him at the hospital, he told her that there was another woman in his life and showed her the dog.

questions.text: What sport did the Admiral always want to play?
questions.explanation:
Baseball.

	He coached a baseball team in Annapolis and he and Harm went to see the Navy and Marines game in 2003.

questions.text: What did the Admiral finally send to Meredith for Christmas in 2004?
questions.explanation:
Poem.

	The poem Jennifer wrote for the Admiral to send to Meredith: "The first present I bought you burnt to a crisp, so I went back and twice checked my list. I still wanted to tell you of my love so I bought you a pair of gloves, but that didn't seem right so I stayed up all night. The ideas I had went from bad to worse so I decided to do this in verse. I think of you day and night and I want you back in my sight. There will be many Christmases to come. I just miss you this one."

questions.text: Where did A.J. say he could be seen once he was retired?
questions.explanation:
Any major baseball park.

	A.J.'s farewell speech: "I will take each and every one of you with me everywhere I go and trust me when I say I'm a better man for having done my service in your company."
